page.title: 14Farming in Woodford
page.content:
Woodford is a predominantly rural area.There are approximately twenty farms in our area each with an average acreage of 40 acres.Also the area has small holdings which grow vegetables and flowers.The area is scattered with ponds,most of which fall on farm land.A breakdown of some of the local farms,given by a local farmer,follows.
{Back Lane Farm}_a dairy farm stocking Friesian cattle.
{Blossoms Farm}_has about 40 acres and stocks dairy cattle,poultry and pigs.
{Grove End Farm}_23 acres and keeps chickens.
{Hawthorn Farm}_ 40 acres,stocks beef cattle,grows potatoes and makes hay.
